sections.purpose: To ensure safe shutdown of laboratory equipment after use.
procedure: Switch OFF the instrument as per manufacturer instructions.
precautions: Wear appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) when shutting down equipment.
Ensure no hazardous materials are left in or around the equipment before shutdown.
Follow manufacturer guidelines for shutdown procedures.
Allow equipment to cool down if it has been in use for extended periods.
Do not switch OFF equipment abruptly unless in emergency.
